researchers and civilians alike have
long been aware of the harmful effects
of high levels of carbon dioxide on the
brain for example an environment where
the air contains 100,000 parts per
million of CO2 can render an adult
unconscious but if you had considered

do to the human brain it turns out even
levels as low as 1,000 parts per million
can reduce the brain's ability to focus
